name: Time Breaker (itch)
description:
Time breaker is a puzzle game where you have the ability to rewind the position and rotation of the cube this allows for interesting and unique puzzles 
after over a month in development the first version of time breaker is released as the first released installment of the black core franchise :)

UPDATE LOG: Patch 1:
  • fixed issue with about section 
  • added link to youtube channel 
  • other minor bug fixes 
Patch 2:
  • fixed problems with static lightmaps on the cube 
  • fixed controller sensitivity
  • other minor bug fixes
